name: Puse
body:
### Welcome to Puse project page

### What is Puse?
 
Puse is a simple sequence diagram drawer which utilizes a different approach for generating diagrams. Instead of drawing sequence diagrams in the old fashioned way of dragging and dropping items, Puse enables users to give textual commands and generate the corresponding graphics immediately.

### Which language and frameworks was used to develop Puse ?

Puse is written in Java-Eclipse and it uses [PlantUml](http://plantuml.sourceforge.net/) framework for generating sequence diagrams.

### Video Tutorials 

I decided to do some video tutorials instead of writing a long document about the functionality of Puse.

1.[Introduction](http://youtu.be/bVb_QMe8Bjw)

2.[Removing Footer From Diagram](http://youtu.be/4B3div_4RnA)

3.[Developing Sequence diagrams incrementally](http://youtu.be/XHCHbEC2D8o)

4.[Open Referenced diagram in new editor](http://youtu.be/u0dnRQigDfs)

5.[Referencing another diagram](http://youtu.be/01th_yb8cTk)

6.[Referencing another diagram on object](http://youtu.be/Yg89jgCTR6s)

7.[Referencing another diagram dynamically](http://youtu.be/D3cNK80knNw)

8.[Exporting diagram](http://youtu.be/_mJ71JmST5g)

If you have a request for any other video, please send me an e-mail.

###Development
Puse is developed in [Eclipse](http://www.eclipse.org/). I put my eclipse-working directory on my github. By opening Eclipse or [IntelliJ IDEA](http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/) and [importing] (http://agile.csc.ncsu.edu/SEMaterials/tutorials/import_export/) your project you can start working on it. You probably need to [update the build-path](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HsPZe-9hyJ4) because Puse uses other frameworks. All frameworks are included in directory. [Here](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/doc/html/index.html) is the Java doc page which you can see all the methods. 

###Syntax 

I will try to provide a document for syntax. However, you can take a look [here](http://plantuml.sourceforge.net/sequence.html). 

###Download and Install 

You can download Puse from [here](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/puse-setup.jar).

##Requirements 

1. Java
2. Graphviz 

##Windows 

1. Run setup file

2. Choose** user file** to install Puse, otherwise Puse will not be able to generate diagrams.(See image below)

![windows installation ](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/images/windows.png)

##Linux

1.) In order to run the setup file you need to set permissions in your Linux system.

![setup permission](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/images/setupconfig.png)

2.) After installation is completed, the file will appear on your desktop. It also requires permission to run.

![setup permission](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/images/shortcut.png)

After this command is written, Puse icon on desktop should change.

3.) Right click on shortcut in desktop and choose properties and add "java -jar" at the beginning of command part.

![setup permission](http://eldemcan.github.io/Puse/images/shortcutsetting.png)

### Support or Contact
If you have any troubles and questions. You can contact with me via eldemcan@gmail.com . Thanks for your attention. You can also visit my personal [web-page](http://about.me/caneldem) also.
